headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway is buying up shares of a lagging 1990s dotcom darling
summary: Berkshire invested $74 million in domain name and internet infrastructure company VeriSign this month.

raw.headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway is buying up shares of a lagging 1990s dotcom darling
raw.summary: Berkshire invested $74 million in domain name and internet infrastructure company VeriSign this month.

headline: VeriSign: Cautiously Bullish On This Stock
summary: VeriSign's strong market position, high margins, and pricing power justify a slight premium valuation. Read why I'm cautiously bullish about VRSN stock.
